sentences: Lapsed armastavad lugusid maagiast ja v√µluritest.
See film sisaldab palju maagiat ja imelisi stseene.
context: Maagia is the Estonian word for magic, referring to supernatural powers or practices believed to control natural forces. It can refer to the art of performing seemingly impossible feats through mysterious means, often associated with wizards, witches, and enchantment in stories and folklore.
